name: RetrieveEnterpriseArchives
description:
Retrieve archives for an enterprise from Box.

This tool retrieves archives for an enterprise using Box's API. It should be called when information about stored archives is needed.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of archive items to return per page when retrieving data.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the position marker to start returning results for pagination in archive retrieval.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
